page.title: 16TELEVISION PROGRAMMES
page.content: My name is Claire and I am 11 years old. My favourite T.V. serial is called Dallas. It is about a modern rich oil family in Dallas, Texas. I like it because sometimes it is exciting and sometimes sad. Each weekly episode leaves you in suspense wondering what will happen next. This is frustrating and yet part of its attraction. My name is Oliver, I am 11 years old. My favourite weekly serial is called The 'A' Team. It is about 4 men in America who have escaped from a U.S. Army prison, and spend their time fighting evil and corruption. My name is Sarah and I am 11 years old. My favourite serial 'Coronation Street' is the longest running prog- ramme in Britain.It is all about life among working class people in a Lancashire town.
